languages.text: Похоронив братьев, Ульфар Пропащий обратился взором в сердце свое и нашел его изломанным и кровоточащим. Преданность Всеотцу, гордость Волка, братская любовь и упоение битвой — все это возложил он на погребальный костер, и осталась в душе лишь глухая злоба. С того момента путь его теряется во мраке, но в Просторе существует жуткая легенда о чудовищном сверхчеловеке, коего не берет смерть, дарителе сбывающихся проклятий. С равной тоской убивает он и набожных, и нечистых, но чаще все же нечистых, ибо обителью себе он выбрал миры у Безбожных звезд, где преданность Императору встречается редко.

After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost looked inward upon his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, the pride of a Wolf, brotherly love, and the thrill of battle — he laid it all upon the pyre, until hollow anger was all that remained in his soul. From that moment on, his path is lost in darkness. But there is an eerie legend in the Expanse that speaks of a monstrous titan rejected by death — a deliverer of curses that come to be. Numbed by sorrow, he slays both the pious and the corrupt, though more often the corrupt, as he has chosen to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor is rare indeed.
languages.original_text: Похоронив братьев, Ульфар Пропащий обратился взором в сердце свое и нашел его изломанным и кровоточащим. Преданность Всеотцу, гордость Волка, братская любовь и упоение битвой — все это возложил он на погребальный костер, и осталась в душе лишь глухая злоба. С того момента путь его теряется во мраке, но в Просторе существует жуткая легенда о чудовищном сверхчеловеке, коего не берет смерть, дарителе сбывающихся проклятий. С равной тоской убивает он и набожных, и нечистых, но чаще все же нечистых, ибо обителью себе он выбрал миры у Безбожных звезд, где преданность Императору встречается редко.

traits.locale_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost threw his gaze onto his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, pride of a Wolf, brotherhood love, ravishment of battle — he has put everything on that pyre, and his soul was left only with hollow anger. From this moment on, his path gets lost in the darkness. There is an eerie legend in the Expanse, that speaks of a monstrous titan, rejected by death, deliverer of curses that come to be. With the same dull sorrow, he slays both pious and corrupt, more often corrupt, as he chose to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor can seldom be found.

With the same dull sorrow, he slays both pious and corrupt, more often corrupt, as he chose to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor can seldom be found.

languages.text: 埋葬了他的兄弟们之后，“迷途之人”乌尔法审视了他那破碎、流血的内心。对全父的忠诚、身为太空野狼的骄傲、兄弟之情，还有战斗的快感——这一切都被他付之一炬，灵魂中只剩下空洞的愤怒。从那一刻起，他的道路迷失于黑暗之中，而科罗努斯扩区开始流传起怪异的传说，讲述某个受到诅咒而被死亡拒绝的巨人。悲痛麻木了他的心灵，他无情地屠戮他遇到的所有人，无论是虔诚之人还是堕落之人。不过，他杀的更多是堕落之人，因为他所在的异端群星之中很少能遇到帝皇的忠诚信徒。
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost looked inward upon his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, the pride of a Wolf, brotherly love, and the thrill of battle — he laid it all upon the pyre, until hollow anger was all that remained in his soul. From that moment on, his path is lost in darkness. But there is an eerie legend in the Expanse that speaks of a monstrous titan rejected by death — a deliverer of curses that come to be. Numbed by sorrow, he slays both the pious and the corrupt, though more often the corrupt, as he has chosen to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor is rare indeed.

traits.locale_text: 埋葬了他的兄弟们之后，“迷途之人”乌尔法审视了他那破碎、流血的内心。对全父的忠诚、身为太空野狼的骄傲、兄弟之情，还有战斗的快感——这一切都被他付之一炬，只剩下空洞的愤怒。从那一刻起，他的道路迷失于黑暗之中，而科罗努斯扩区开始流传起怪异的传说，讲述某个受到诅咒而被死亡拒绝的巨人。悲痛麻木了他的心灵，他无情地屠戮他遇到的所有人，无论是虔诚之人还是堕落之人。不过，他杀的更多是堕落之人，因为他所在的异端群星之中很少能遇到帝皇的忠诚信徒。

languages.text: Nachdem er seine Brüder begraben hatte, blickte Ulfar Siegtnie nach innen auf sein Herz und stellte fest, dass es gebrochen war und blutete. Die Loyalität dem Allvater gegenüber, den Stolz eines Wolfs, brüderliche Liebe und den Rausch des Kampfs — er warf alles auf den Scheiterhaufen, bis in seiner Seele nur hohle Wut zurückblieb. Wie sein Pfad danach weiterging, liegt im Dunkeln. Es gibt jedoch in der Ausdehnung eine gruselige Legende von einem monströsen Titan, den der Tod abgelehnt hat. Angeblich spricht er Flüche aus, die dann auch Wirklichkeit werden. Von der Trauer betäubt richtet er sowohl die Frommen als auch die Verderbten, wenn auch öfter die Verderbten. Er lebt auf den Welten in den Sternen der Ungläubigen, wo die Verehrung des Imperators eine Seltenheit ist.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost looked inward upon his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, the pride of a Wolf, brotherly love, and the thrill of battle — he laid it all upon the pyre, until hollow anger was all that remained in his soul. traits.locale_text: Nachdem er seine Brüder begraben hatte, blickte Ulfar Siegtnie nach innen auf sein Herz und stellte fest, dass es gebrochen war und blutete. Die Loyalität dem Allvater gegenüber, den Stolz eines Wolfs, brüderliche Liebe und den Rausch des Kampfs — er warf alles auf den Scheiterhaufen und in seiner Seele blieb nur hohle Wut zurück. Wie sein Pfad danach weiterging, liegt im Dunkeln. Es gibt jedoch in der Ausdehnung eine gruselige Legende von einem monströsen Titan, den der Tod abgelehnt hat. Angeblich spricht er Flüche aus, die dann auch Wirklichkeit werden. Von der Trauer betäubt richtet er sowohl die Frommen als auch die Verderbten, wenn auch öfter die Verderbten. Er lebt auf den Welten in den Sternen der Ungläubigen, wo die Verehrung des Imperators eine Seltenheit ist.

languages.text: Après avoir enterré ses frères, Ulfar l'Égaré sonda les profondeurs de son cœur et le trouva brisé. Loyauté envers le Père de Tous, fierté d'appartenir aux Loups, amour fraternel et ivresse du combat... Il déposa le tout sur le bûcher pour ne garder en son âme qu'une colère froide. De ce jour, sa voie s'égara dans les ténèbres, mais il circule dans les Étendues une étrange légende au sujet d'un monstrueux titan rejeté par la mort qui s'est fait l'implacable exécuteur des malédictions. Aveuglé par le chagrin, il élimine les corrompus – sans pour autant épargner les pieux – sur les mondes des Étoiles Athées où la dévotion à l'Empereur est davantage l'exception que la règle.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost looked inward upon his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, the pride of a Wolf, brotherly love, and the thrill of battle — he laid it all upon the pyre, until hollow anger was all that remained in his soul. From that moment on, his path is lost in darkness. But there is an eerie legend in the Expanse that speaks of a monstrous titan rejected by death — a deliverer of curses that come to be. Numbed by sorrow, he slays both the pious and the corrupt, though more often the corrupt, as he has chosen to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor is rare indeed.

traits.locale_text: Après avoir enterré ses frères, Ulfar l'Égaré sonda les profondeurs de son cœur et le trouva brisé. Loyauté envers le Père de Tous, fierté d'appartenir aux Loups, amour fraternel et ivresse du combat... Il déposa tout ce qui l'animait sur le bûcher pour ne garder en son âme qu'une colère froide. De ce jour, sa voie s'égara dans les ténèbres, mais il circule dans les Étendues une étrange légende au sujet d'un monstrueux titan rejeté par la mort qui s’est fait l'implacable exécuteur des malédictions. Aveuglé par le chagrin, il élimine les corrompus – sans pour autant épargner les pieux – sur les mondes des Étoiles Athées où la dévotion à l'Empereur est davantage l'exception que la règle.

languages.text: Después de enterrar a sus hermanos, Ulfar el Perdido inspeccionó su corazón y lo encontró roto y sangrante. Arrojó a la pira su lealtad al Padre de todas las cosas, su orgullo de Lobo, su amor fraternal y la emoción de la batalla, lo que dejó su alma con tan solo una furia vacía. Desde aquel momento, su camino se perdió en la oscuridad. Sin embargo, una siniestra leyenda de la Extensión habla de la aparición de un titán monstruoso rechazado por la muerte y portador de maldiciones. Insensible por el dolor, mata tanto a piadosos como a corruptos, aunque los corruptos son su víctima más frecuente, ya que ha decidido habitar en los mundos de las Estrellas Paganas, donde la devoción al Emperador es una virtud escasa.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost looked inward upon his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, the pride of a Wolf, brotherly love, and the thrill of battle — he laid it all upon the pyre, until hollow anger was all that remained in his soul. From that moment on, his path is lost in darkness. But there is an eerie legend in the Expanse that speaks of a monstrous titan rejected by death — a deliverer of curses that come to be. Numbed by sorrow, he slays both the pious and the corrupt, though more often the corrupt, as he has chosen to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor is rare indeed.

Arrojó a la pira su lealtad al Padre de todas las cosas, su orgullo de Lobo, su amor fraternal y la emoción de la batalla, lo que dejó su alma con tan solo una furia vacía. Desde aquel momento, su camino se perdió en la oscuridad. Sin embargo, una siniestra leyenda de la Extensión habla de la aparición de un titán monstruoso rechazado por la muerte y portador de maldiciones. Insensible por el dolor, mata tanto a piadosos como a corruptos, aunque los corruptos son su víctima más frecuente, ya que decidió habitar en los mundos de las Estrellas Paganas, donde la devoción al Emperador es una virtud escasa.

languages.text: 同胞の埋葬を済ませ、自身らの心をのぞき見たウルファー・エバーロストは、それが傷つき血を流していることに気づいた。全知の父への忠義、ウルフの誇り、同胞愛、戦いの戦慄…。すべてを弔いの火にくべたウルファーの魂に残されたのは、あまりにも虚しい怒りだけだった。その瞬間から、彼の行く手は闇に包まれた。ただエクスパンスには奇妙な逸話があり、死に拒まれた奇怪な巨人が…来るべき呪いをもたらす解放者がいるという。悲しみに我を忘れたウルファーは、敬虔な者と汚れた者をどちらも屠った。その中に汚れた者が多かったのは、ウルファーが「異教に歌われし星々」に住まうことを選んだからだ。この地では、皇帝へ献身を捧げる者があまりいなかったのだ。
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost looked inward upon his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, the pride of a Wolf, brotherly love, and the thrill of battle — he laid it all upon the pyre, until hollow anger was all that remained in his soul. From that moment on, his path is lost in darkness. But there is an eerie legend in the Expanse that speaks of a monstrous titan rejected by death — a deliverer of curses that come to be. Numbed by sorrow, he slays both the pious and the corrupt, though more often the corrupt, as he has chosen to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor is rare indeed.

traits.locale_text: 同胞の埋葬を済ませ、自身らの心をのぞき見たウルファー・エバーロストは、それが傷つき血を流していることに気づいた。全知の父への忠義、ウルフの誇り、同胞愛、戦いの戦慄…。すべてを弔いの火にくべたウルファーの魂に残されたのは、虚しい怒りだけだった。その瞬間から、彼の行く手は闇に包まれた。ただエクスパンスには奇妙な逸話があり、死に拒まれた奇怪な巨人が…来るべき呪いをもたらす解放者がいるという。悲しみに我を忘れたウルファーは、敬虔な者と汚れた者をどちらも屠った。その中に汚れた者が多かったのは、ウルファーが「異教に歌われし星々」に住まうことを選んだからだ。この地では、皇帝へ献身を捧げる者があまりいなかったのだ。

languages.text: Ulfar Hepgaip, kardeşlerini toprağa verdikten sonra iç dünyasına döndü ve kalbinin kırık, kanamakta olduğunu gördü. Yücebaba'ya sadakat, Kurtluk gururu, kardeş sevgisi ve savaş heyecanı. Ruhunda yalnızca boş bir öfke kalana dek Hepsini odun yığınlarına atıp yaktı. O andan itibaren nasıl bir yol izlediği bilinmiyor. Ancak Enginlik'te; ölümün reddettiği, lanetleri gerçeğe dönüştüren, korkunç bir devden söz eden, tüyler ürpertici bir efsane anlatılageldi. Yaşadığı hüzünler nedeniyle hissizleşen savaşçı, inançlıları da yozlaşmışları da katlediyordu. Bulunduğu yer ise İmparator'a bağlılığın nadir olduğu Küffar Yıldızlar dünyaları olduğu için kurbanları genellikle yozlaşmış kimselerdi.
languages.original_text: After burying his brothers, Ulfar Everlost looked inward upon his heart and found it broken and bleeding. Loyalty to the Allfather, the pride of a Wolf, brotherly love, and the thrill of battle — he laid it all upon the pyre, until hollow anger was all that remained in his soul. From that moment on, his path is lost in darkness. But there is an eerie legend in the Expanse that speaks of a monstrous titan rejected by death — a deliverer of curses that come to be. Numbed by sorrow, he slays both the pious and the corrupt, though more often the corrupt, as he has chosen to dwell upon the worlds of the Heathen Stars, where devotion to the Emperor is rare indeed.

traits.locale_text: Ulfar Hepgaip, kardeşlerini toprağa verdikten sonra iç dünyasına döndü ve kalbinin kırık ve kanıyor olduğunu gördü. Yücebaba'ya sadakat, bir Kurt'un gururu, kardeş sevgisi ve savaşın heyecanı. Hepsini odun yığınlarının içine atarak yaktı, ta ki ruhunda geriye yalnızca boş bir öfke kalana kadar. O andan itibaren nasıl bir yol izlediği bilinmiyor. Ancak Enginlik'te, ölümün reddettiği, lanetleri gerçeğe dönüştüren, korkunç bir devden söz eden, tüyler ürpertici bir efsane ortaya çıktı. Yaşadığı hüzünler nedeniyle hissizleşen savaşçı, inançlıları da, yozlaşmışları da katlediyordu. Ancak bulunmayı seçtiği yer İmparator'a bağlılığın nadir olduğu Küffar Yıldızlar dünyaları olduğu için, katlettikleri genellikle yozlaşmışlardı.
